source:
#### The purpose of this notebook is to read data from Harmoised layer and build a table for Curated Layer.

**Author**                         **Created Date**                **Description**  
Prathap Adicherla         25-02-2025             This Notebook is designed to facilitate Enriches data with HR attributes.

from odw.core.util.logging_util import LoggingUtil
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf,col,lit,when,coalesce,concat,sum,avg,max,min,count,countDistinct,date_format,to_date,datediff,months_between,year,month,hour,minute,second,expr,asc,desc
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType,TimestampType,StringType,IntegerType,FloatType,DoubleType,BooleanType,StructType,StructField,ArrayType,MapType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from pyspark.sql.functions import row_number,rank,dense_rank,lag,lead,ntile
from pyspark.sql import SQLContext
from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql.avro.functions import from_avro, to_avro
from pyspark.sql.streaming import DataStreamReader, DataStreamWriter
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql.catalog import Catalog
from pyspark.sql.column import Column
from pyspark.sql.group import GroupedData
from pyspark.sql.pandas.functions import pandas_udf
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

try:
    LoggingUtil().log_info("Starting SAP HR historical data load")
    spark.conf.set("spark.sql.legacy.timeParserPolicy", "LEGACY")
    # First get count of records to be loaded
    source_count = spark.sql("""
    SELECT COUNT(*) as count 
    FROM odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_hist_mig
    """).collect()[0]['count']
    
    LoggingUtil().log_info(f"Found {source_count} records in source table")
    
    # Clear historical data
    LoggingUtil().log_info("Clearing existing data from hist_SAP_HR")
    spark.sql("DELETE FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR")
    
    # Insert data with type conversions
    LoggingUtil().log_info("Loading transformed data into hist_SAP_HR")
    spark.sql("""
    INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
    SELECT
        CASE 
    WHEN LENGTH(PersNo) < 8 AND PersNo NOT LIKE '0%' 
    THEN LPAD(PersNo, 8, '0') 
    ELSE PersNo 
  END AS PersNo ,
        Firstname,
        Lastname,
CASE 
    WHEN EmployeeNo IS NULL THEN NULL
    
    ELSE TRIM(EmployeeNo)
END AS EmployeeNo,

        CoCd,
        CompanyCode,
        PA,
        PersonnelArea,
        PSubarea,
        PersonnelSubarea,
        Orgunit,
        OrganizationalUnit,
        Organizationalkey,
        OrganizationalKey1,
        WorkC,
        WorkContract,
      case WHEN LENGTH(CT) < 2 AND CT NOT LIKE '0%' 
    THEN LPAD(CT, 2, '0') 
    ELSE CT 
  END AS CT,
        ContractType,
        PSgroup,
        PayBandDescription,
CASE 
    WHEN TRIM(FTE) = '' OR TRIM(FTE) = 'NULL' THEN NULL 
    ELSE FORMAT_NUMBER(TRY_CAST(FTE AS FLOAT), 2)
END AS FTE,
CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(Wkhrs) = '' OR TRIM(Wkhrs) = 'NULL' THEN NULL 
            ELSE CAST(ROUND(TRY_CAST(Wkhrs AS FLOAT), 4) AS DECIMAL(18,4))
        END AS Wkhrs,
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(IndicatorPartTimeEmployee) = '' OR TRIM(IndicatorPartTimeEmployee) = 'NULL' THEN NULL 
            ELSE IndicatorPartTimeEmployee 
        END AS IndicatorPartTimeEmployee,
        S,
        EmploymentStatus,
        GenderKey,
        TRAStartDate,
        TRAEndDate,
        TRAStatus,
        TRAGrade,
        PrevPersNo,
       case WHEN LENGTH(ActR) < 2 AND ActR NOT LIKE '0%' 
    THEN LPAD(ActR, 2, '0') 
    ELSE ActR 
    END AS ActR,
        ReasonforAction,
        Position,
        Position1,
        CostCtr,
        CostCentre,
    CASE 
        WHEN CivilServiceStart IS NULL OR TRIM(CivilServiceStart) = '' OR TRIM(CivilServiceStart) = 'NULL' 
            THEN NULL
       
        WHEN CivilServiceStart RLIKE '^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{1,2}-[0-9]{1,2}$'
            THEN to_date(CivilServiceStart, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
        
        ELSE try_cast(to_date(CivilServiceStart, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS DATE)
    END AS CivilServiceStart,


    CASE 
        WHEN DatetoCurrentJob IS NULL OR TRIM(DatetoCurrentJob) = '' OR TRIM(DatetoCurrentJob) = 'NULL' 
            THEN NULL
       
        WHEN DatetoCurrentJob RLIKE '^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{1,2}-[0-9]{1,2}$'
            THEN to_date(DatetoCurrentJob, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
        
        ELSE try_cast(to_date(DatetoCurrentJob, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS DATE)
    END AS DatetoCurrentJob ,


    CASE 
        WHEN SeniorityDate IS NULL OR TRIM(SeniorityDate) = '' OR TRIM(SeniorityDate) = 'NULL' 
            THEN NULL
       
        WHEN SeniorityDate RLIKE '^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{1,2}-[0-9]{1,2}$'
            THEN to_date(SeniorityDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
        
        ELSE try_cast(to_date(SeniorityDate, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS DATE)
    END AS SeniorityDate,


     CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(DatetoSubsitGrade) = '' OR TRIM(DatetoSubsitGrade) = 'NULL' THEN NULL 
            ELSE TRY_CAST(to_timestamp(DatetoSubsitGrade, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS DATE) 
        END AS DatetoSubsitGrade,
CASE 
    WHEN LENGTH(trim(PersNo1)) < 8 
    THEN LPAD(trim(PersNo1), 8, '0') 
    ELSE trim(PersNo1) 
END AS PersNo1,
        NameofManagerOM,
       CASE 
    WHEN LENGTH(trim(ManagerPosition)) < 8 
    THEN LPAD(trim(ManagerPosition), 8, '0') 
    ELSE trim(ManagerPosition) 
END AS ManagerPosition,
        ManagerPositionText,
        CounterSignManager,
        CASE 
    WHEN LENGTH(Loc) < 3 AND PersNo NOT LIKE '0%' 
    THEN LPAD(Loc, 3, '0') 
    ELSE Loc 
  END AS Loc,
        Location,
CASE 
    WHEN OrgStartDate IS NULL OR TRIM(OrgStartDate) = '' OR TRIM(OrgStartDate) = 'NULL' 
        THEN NULL
    -- For dd/MM/yyyy format (your actual data format)
    WHEN OrgStartDate LIKE '%/%'
        THEN TO_DATE(OrgStartDate, 'dd/MM/yyyy')
    -- Fallback for other formats (if any exist)
    ELSE TRY_CAST(OrgStartDate AS DATE)
END AS OrgStartDate ,
   CASE
        WHEN FixTermEndDate IS NULL THEN NULL
        ELSE DATE_FORMAT(TO_DATE(FixTermEndDate, 'dd/MM/yyyy'), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
    END AS FixTermEndDate ,
CASE 
        WHEN LoanStartDate IS NULL THEN NULL
        ELSE DATE_FORMAT(TO_DATE(LoanStartDate, 'dd/MM/yyyy'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') 
    END AS LoanStartDate,
    CASE 
        WHEN LoanEndDate IS NULL THEN NULL
        ELSE DATE_FORMAT(TO_DATE(LoanEndDate, 'dd/MM/yyyy'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') 
    END AS LoanEndDate,
        EEGrp,
        EmployeeGroup,
         Annualsalary,
        Curr,
         NInumber,
        CASE 
        WHEN Birthdate IS NULL THEN NULL
        ELSE DATE_FORMAT(TO_DATE(Birthdate, 'dd/MM/yyyy'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') 
    END AS Birthdate,
       case when Ageofemployee ='NULL' then NULL else Ageofemployee end as  Ageofemployee,
        EO,
        Ethnicorigin,
        NID,
        Rel,
        ReligiousDenominationKey,
        SxO,
        WageType,
        EmployeeSubgroup,
        LOAAbsType,
        LOAAbsenceTypeText,
        Schemereference,
        PensionSchemeName,
        DisabilityCode,
        case when DisabilityText = NULL then '' else DisabilityText end as DisabilityText,
        DisabilityCodeDescription,
        PArea,
        PayrollArea,
         case when AssignmentNumber ='NULL' then '' else AssignmentNumber end as AssignmentNumber,
CASE 
    WHEN TRIM(FTE2) = '' OR TRIM(FTE2) = 'NULL' THEN NULL 
    ELSE FORMAT_NUMBER(TRY_CAST(FTE2 AS FLOAT), 3)
END AS FTE2,
        CASE 
            WHEN TRIM(Report_MonthEnd_Date) = '' OR TRIM(Report_MonthEnd_Date) = 'NULL' THEN NULL 
            ELSE TRY_CAST(to_timestamp(Report_MonthEnd_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy") AS DATE) 
        END AS Report_MonthEnd_Date,
        CURRENT_DATE() AS PDAC_ETL_Date,
        'saphr' AS SourceSystemID,
        CURRENT_DATE() AS IngestionDate,
        CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS ValidTo,
        NULL AS RowID,
        'Y' AS IsActive,
CASE 
    WHEN TRIM(leave_entitlement_hrs) = '' OR TRIM(leave_entitlement_hrs) = 'NULL' THEN NULL 
    ELSE CAST(ROUND(TRY_CAST(leave_entitlement_hrs AS FLOAT), 4) AS DECIMAL(18,4))
END AS leave_entitlement_hrs,

CASE 
    WHEN TRIM(leave_taken_hrs) = '' OR TRIM(leave_taken_hrs) = 'NULL' THEN NULL 
    ELSE CAST(ROUND(TRY_CAST(leave_taken_hrs AS FLOAT), 4) AS DECIMAL(18,4))
END AS leave_taken_hrs,

CASE 
    WHEN TRIM(leave_remaining_hours) = '' OR TRIM(leave_remaining_hours) = 'NULL' THEN NULL 
    ELSE CAST(ROUND(TRY_CAST(leave_remaining_hours AS FLOAT), 4) AS DECIMAL(18,4))
END AS leave_remaining_hours,

CASE 
    WHEN TRIM(leave_remaining_prorata_hours) = '' OR TRIM(leave_remaining_prorata_hours) = 'NULL' THEN NULL 
    ELSE CAST(ROUND(TRY_CAST(leave_remaining_prorata_hours AS FLOAT), 4) AS DECIMAL(18,4))
END AS leave_remaining_prorata_hours
    FROM 
        odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_hist_mig
    """)
    
    # Verify the load was successful
    loaded_count = spark.sql("""
    SELECT COUNT(*) as count 
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_SAP_HR
    WHERE IngestionDate = current_date()
    """).collect()[0]['count']
    
    LoggingUtil().log_info(f"Successfully loaded {loaded_count} records")
    
    if loaded_count != source_count:
        logWarning(f"Count mismatch: Source had {source_count} records, loaded {loaded_count} records")
    else:
        LoggingUtil().log_info("Record counts match between source and target")
    
    LoggingUtil().log_info("SAP HR historical data load completed successfully")

except Exception as e:
    # Log the exception in detail
    LoggingUtil().log_error(f"Error during SAP HR historical data load: {str(e)}")
    logException(e)
    
    # Re-raise the exception to ensure the notebook fails properly
    raise e
finally:
    # Always flush logs regardless of success or failure
    LoggingUtil().log_info("Flushing logs")
    flushLogging()
